CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Executive'), True, IF(ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Agency') && ISPICKVAL(Parent.Type,'Root' ), True, IF(ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Division')&& ISPICKVAL(Parent.Parent.Type,'Root' ), True, IF(ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Office') && ISPICKVAL(Parent.Parent.Parent.Type,'Root' ), True,false))))
CustomField.label: X_HideForGMSAdmin
